titleStmt.title: A ioyful song of the royall receiuing of the Queenes most excellent Maiestie into her highnesse campe at Tilsburie in Essex: on Thursday and Fryday the eight and ninth of August. 1588 To the tune of Triumph and ioy.
titleStmt.author: T. I., fl. 1588.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn W[olf]e for Richard Iones,

notesStmt.note: A song - "Good English men whose valiant harts,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
